item.name: Delete
01 - Return no content status when delete customer by id
02 - Return bad request status when delete customer by invalid id
03 - Return not found status when delete by not found customer id
04 - Return not found status when delete by customer id already deleted
Get all by name or email paginated
01 - Return ok status when get customers by name or email
02 - Return ok status and empty result when get customers by name or email and customers do not exists
03 - Products

01 - Return created status when create new product
